app.name: FlowDown
app.description: is an AI assistant that works for you.

items.question: What is FlowDown?
items.answer:
FlowDown is a native AI client built with Swift and UIKit. It provides a lightweight, privacy-focused interface for interacting with various AI language models.

With its blazing fast text rendering and markdown support, FlowDown delivers a smooth and responsive AI conversation experience.

items.question: Which AI models does FlowDown support?
items.answer:
We provide free cloud model for every user who downloads FlowDown from the App Store, to offer convenience. You can learn about the service providers in privacy pages. This configuration is controlled by the cloud and cannot be modified.

Additionally, FlowDown supports enterprise api.

items.question: Is my data protected?
items.answer:
Yes, privacy is a core design principle of FlowDown. Your conversations stay on your device by default, and you have complete control over which AI service provider you connect to.

FlowDown is designed to give you ownership of your data while still providing a powerful AI assistant experience.

items.question: What is the Community Editions?
items.answer: The Community Edition is an early version of FlowDown. It has been deprecated as the main program is now fully open source. Additionally, the Community Edition uses a more permissive MIT license.

landing.hero3: You can OWN a blazing fast and smooth Agent app. Switch between your AI services or use local models on your device.
